main module¶

main.generator(X1_data, X2_data, batch_size)[source]¶
main.get_file(filename)[source]¶

Get matrix from file ‘filename’.

main.hist_res(res, n_bins=50, title='Residuals distribution', x_label='x label', y_label='Residuals')[source]¶

Take residuals and plot histogram.

main.my_metric(y_true, y_pred)[source]¶

Computes loss = mean(sqrt(y_true - y_pred)**2 / y_true), axis=-1)

main.my_metric2(y_true, y_pred)[source]¶

Computes loss = mean(abs((y_true - y_pred) / y_true)), axis=-1)

main.my_metric3(y_true, y_pred)[source]¶

Computes loss = mean(abs((y_true - y_pred) / y_true)), axis=-1)
